knowledge_panel.description: quake iii arena is a 1999 multiplayer-focused first-person shooter developed by id software. it is the third game in the quake series and also the first spin-off to quake; it differs from previous games by excluding a story-based single-player mode and focusing on multiplayer gameplay. wikipedia
